text: Robert Braithwaite, CBE, DL (12 May 1943 â€“ 7 March 2019) was a British entrepreneur and marine engineer. He was known as the Founder and President of the luxury powerboat manufacturer, alongside John Macklin, Sunseeker. He was born in Otley, Yorkshire. Braithwaite died in the early hours of 7 March 2019, aged 75. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English businesspeople Category:People from West Yorkshire Category:Marine engineers
title: Robert Braithwaite (engineer)
